data.title: ccui::TextInput changes password style symbol
data.body:
If ui TextField is in focus then password style text is like '*****', but after loosing focus it changes to '● ● ● ● ●'.

Works with HEAD of v3.

1. action may be ran more than specified times
2. instant action will ran one frame later

data.title: Add missing virtual destructor in ILocalizationManager
data.body:
Hello, I get the following warning when I compile with Xcode 7.3:

```
cocos/editor-support/cocostudio/LocalizationManager.h:13:11: 'cocostudio::ILocalizationManager' has virtual functions but non-virtual destructor
```

This pull request adds missing virtual destructor in ILocalizationManager, and fixes it. Thanks!

data.title: fix: compile cpp-tests in release mode
data.body:
replace some deprecated functions
use `log` instead of `CCLOG` in order to avoid Warnings when not using
some variables

data.title: Repeat does not work properly
Withespaces does matter
data.body:
Atom, my favorite text editor, it trims white spaces at end of line and make one and only empty ending line.
Each time I make a pull request, it will contains a lots of changes to tailing spaces and ending lines.
It is not nice for a simple PR, like [this](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/15343/files), contains a lot of white space changes.

So I write a coding style tool `tools/coding-style/tailing-spaces.py` which clean the tailing whitespaces and ending lines once for all.

in this tool:
- it remove tailing white spaces
- and ensures one and only one empty ending line.
- it fixes '.c', '.cpp', '.h', '.hpp', '.m', '.mm', '.java' sources in
  - $engineRoot/cocos
  - $engineRoot/extensions
  - $engineRoot/templates
  - $engineRoot/tests
  - $engineRoot/tools/simulator

I think this tool is good to add to @CocosRobot when updating bindings.

data.title: Use pre-processor condition rather than runtime check.
Allow plist and other ValueMap files be (easy) decrypted.
data.body:
The origin implementation of `FileUtilsApple::getValueMapFromFile()` reads the contents of file and parse it by calling one Apple API.
This make it harder to decrypt user encrypted plist files.

This PR use the `FileUtils::getDataFromFile()` to read file data and then use `getValueMapFromData()`
to parse it into a ValueMap. Where `FileUtils::getDataFromFile()` can be overwrite by user's decoding file utils (say `DecodingFileUtils`).

I know that user's `DecodingFileUtils` can also overwrite `getValueMapFromFile`, but this pr make the author of `DecodingFileUtils` less suffering.

data.title: Fix in cpp-test bugs test scene 13 crash
Chipmunk demo issue
data.body:
Steps to reproduce:
- run cpp-tests -> Node::Physics -> enter `3:PhysicsComponentTest`
- touch the screen to add some sprites
- continue clicking `Toggle debug` and touching screen to add sprites

result:
- sometimes sprites disappeared after clicking `Toggle debug`

test device：`iPad4 iOS 9.0.1`
PS: Mac works ok.

data.title: Node:Physics crashed on first test case
data.body:
`cpp-tests` crashed on iPad4 iOS 9.0.1 and worked ok on:
- Mac OS X
- iPhone4 iOS 6.1.2

`lua-tests` crashed on Windows 10.

data.title: ui TextFiled show password
data.body:
If set password enabled in ui::TextField, then enter some text to it and remove focus from it, password will be shown as raw string. It will be hidden by password style text only if enter focus and write something.

Reproduces at HEAD of v3.
